name: Piggy Pixel Art Coloring Paint
description:
Piggy Pixel Art Coloring Paint is a free painting and drawing app for all Piggy fans
Get hours of relaxation and fun! Discover tons of 2D artworks or create your own pixel art. Color. Relax. Enjoy!
Piggy Pixel Art Coloring Paint also is the perfect canvas for creating the most imaginative art.
Simple and fun, the concept is simple, just follow the color key to complete the picture. Discover a huge collection of Characters pixel.
How to play
Pinch with two fingers to zoom in or zoom out your canvas.
Select colors in the bottom and color by number.
Long press to paint the same number cells continuously which makes painting
faster and easier.
Features:

- Tons of amazing images. Explore daily updated collection of new pixel arts for you to color;

- 2D coloring. Get an amazing coloring experience with 2D images;

- Various coloring tools. Use bucket or bomb to paint multiple neighboring cells of any numbers;

- Easy coloring. Enjoy intuitive design and smooth performance of the app;

- Simple and easy interface;

- I liked to paint very much, but have you already painted your favorite image? Do not worry, click on the button to repaint, to again experience the joy of coloring by number;
